---
title: "Datos de cantones de Costa Rica"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r paquetes, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
```

```{r lectura-datos, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
cantones <- 
  st_read(dsn  = "cantones_simplificados.geojson", quiet = TRUE) %>% 
  st_transform(4326)
```



Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Mapa de cantones 

```{r}
leaflet()%>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolygons(data = cantones, weight = 1.0)

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Tabla 

```{r Tabla}
cantones %>%
  select(provincia, canton, area) %>%
  datatable(options = list(
    pageLength = 7,
    language = list(url = '//cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/Spanish.json')
  ))
```

### Mapa Leaflet 

```{r mapa_leaflet}
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles(group = "OpenStreetMap") %>% 
  addPolygons( 
    data = cantones,
    color = "black",
    fillColor = "transparent",
    stroke = TRUE,
    weight = 1.0,
  )
```
